translated: The One World Trace Center (WTC 1) formerly known as Freedom Tower (meaning Freedom Tower) is a huge and significant skyscraper located in the district of Lower Manhattan in New York in the United States.
original: Le One World Trace Center (WTC1) anciennement appelé Freedom Tower (qui signifie Tour de la Liberté) est un immense et important gratte-ciel situé dans le quartier de Lower Manhattan à New-York aux Etats-Unis.
